steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 30-2009. A 77-year-old 
man with recurrent transitional-cell carcinoma of the ureter.
Kaufman DS(1), McDougal WS, Harisinghani MG, Wu CL.

Author information:
(1)Hematology-Oncology Division, Department of Medicine, Massachusetts General 
Hospital, and Harvard Medical School, USA.
